com.facebook.buck.cli

Class TestRunning

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.cli.TestRunning

  • public class TestRunning
extends Object
    Utility class for running tests from TestRules which have been built.

    • Method Summary

      • writeXmlOutput

        public static void writeXmlOutput(List<TestResults> allResults,
                                  Writer writer)
                           throws IOException
        Writes the test results in XML format to the supplied writer.

        This method does NOT close the writer object.

        Parameters:
        allResults - The test results.
        writer - The writer in which the XML data will be written to.
        Throws:
        IOException
